Legal Notices:

" ZeroTermux is a non-profit software developed based on Termux

Part of the copyright belongs to ZeroTermux

No responsibility for any legal issues and risks, and no commercial purpose


 Do not use for illegal purposes! 
 
 Please abide by the law and be a good citizen,
 
 The original intention of ZeroTermux is to let you enter the linux world faster, contribute a spirit to the construction of society in the future, and make a contribution
 

After a certain level of use, it is strongly recommended that you transition to the official termux [start using after getting started] (recommended),
 

After all, ZT can help you for a while, but it can't help you for the rest of your life!
 

Note: [Delete function may empty your SD card] in the [Switch system] function
 
 Please turn off the sd card authorization to execute the [Delete] function
 
 If your operation (not limited to the [Delete Function] of [Switch System], here is all the functions of ZeroTermux), your SD card includes:
 
 Photo
 Video
 Audio
 As well as all other data, you (the personal user of ZeroTermux (ZT)) are responsible for yourself
 

The download source of the public warehouse is uncontrollable and is not under the control of ZeroTermux. It all comes from a third-party warehouse. ZeroTermux and the author will not be responsible for everything from the third-party warehouse!
 
 
 If the third-party warehouse has all illegal activities/documents, the author who provides the third-party warehouse bears any legal responsibility! ZeroTermux and the author do not bear any legal/other responsibilities!

All functions of ZeroTermux can only be used for personal learning and communication, not for commercial use! and illegal use!

1. This software (ZeroTermux) is open source software, you can freely distribute, copy, and change, but please follow the GPL agreement!

 2. The software follows the GPL agreement (http://www.opensource.org/licenses/gpl-2.0.php)

 3. All the functions of this software (ZeroTermux) are for learning and communication use, do not use commercially, such as accidental operations, intentional operations, unintentional operations, etc. of the user (users who use ZeroTermux) are borne by the user!
 4. This software (ZeroTermux) is used for free learning and communication as in the first regulation. The icons and fonts involved in the software are all from the Internet. 
 4.1. The font is the Android default font. If you use other fonts, please users (users using ZeroTermux) bear all risks and legal responsibilities. 
 4.2. The icon is used as the public library of Alibaba ICO. The principle of using the icon is for learning and communication, not for commercial use. If there is any infringement, it will be deleted immediately. 
 5. The recovery packages, data packages, zip packages, etc. used in this software (ZeroTermux) are all at risk. All of them are from the Internet. Please use it at your discretion. If any irreparable loss is caused, the user shall bear the risk. . 
 6. All recovery packages, data packages,module packages, and zip packages ZeroTermux cannot control their content. If there is any infringement in the package, the author of this software does not bear any responsibility, and the creator of the recovery package, data package, and zip package shall bear the responsibility (tar.gz backup function law statement). 
 7. Thanks to all the authors of the functions applied to this project. 
 8.Using ZeroTermux will directly or indirectly damage your equipment. If there is any irreparable loss, the user shall bear the responsibility of the software and the author.

Jump to ZeroTermux GITHUB page\nAdditional extension engine package for ZeroTermux

ZeroTermux is a secondary development based on Termux, adding
auxiliary functions that are not available in Termux, making it easy to get started quickly
This software can be equivalent to a mini-linux system and can be additionally installed
Other distributions such as: Ubuntu, CentOs, etc.

ZeroCoreManage is an expansion pack based on ZeroTermux. The purpose of extending the ZeroTermux function is to reduce the size of the ZeroTermux software package. ZeroTermux can still run normally without installing this expansion pack. Extra engine content:

1. Built-in Keyboard
2. WEB access memory card
3. X86 Alpine

Terminal display anomaly detected. Automatic recovery completed.

Requires app restart to take effect

 • Internal Channel: X11 output displays directly on terminal background
 • External Channel: X11 output displays via Termux:X11 APK
 ⚠️ Internal Channel may impact performance

 Known Issue: Rapid consecutive back operations may cause black screen in Internal Channel. Press back again and re-enter to recover.

 ⚠️ Key Conflict: When Internal Channel is enabled, volume keys will be remapped to open left/right panels. To use native Termux volume key functions, disable Internal Channel. 
 ⚠️ Background conflict: The internal channel will affect the background video/background image display, switch to the external channel to restore

Unsupported or unrecognized due to low ZT version: \"

Available Commands:
 ZeroTermux Terminal Command Explanation 
 Version 0.1 
 
 
 --------Version 0.1 Update--------
 
 Basic Category: 
 
 help - Show help 
 openleft(ol) - Open left panel 
 openright(or) - Open right panel 
 reboot(rb) - Reboot termux 
 toast - Show a bottom toast message with custom content 
 toast[ 
 Example: zt toast hello 
 ] 
 version(v) - View current version information 
 
 
 Graphics Connection Related:
 
 vnc - Connect to vnc (zt vnc address_port_username_password) 
 vnc[ 
 Example: zt vnc 127.0.0.1_5900_admin_admin 
 Enter 'none' if username or password is empty 
 Example (empty password): zt vnc 127.0.0.1_5900_admin_none 
 Example (empty username): zt vnc 127.0.0.1_5900_none_admin 
 Example (both empty): zt vnc 127.0.0.1_5900_none_none 
 Note: Address and port cannot be empty!
 ] 
 x11commandshow(x11xs) - Show terminal (x11 must be running) 
 x11commandhide(x11xh) - Hide terminal (x11 must be running) 
 x11keyboardshow(x11kbs) - Show x11 keyboard 
 x11keyboardhide(x11kbh) - Hide x11 keyboard 
 
 
 Create Symbolic Link 
 ln - Create symbolic link 
 ln[ 
 Description: current directory internal storage path 
 Note: Both paths must be absolute paths 
 Example: ln /data/data/com.termux/files/home/custom_name /sdcard/ 
 Example (or specify a directory): ln /data/data/com.termux/files/home/custom_name /sdcard/custom_directory/ 
 ] 
 --------Version 0.2 Update--------
 zt dialog 
 dialog[
 Usage Help:
 -c Confirmation/cancel dialog (OK or Cancel), Example: zt dialog -c -t title -m message content 
 -s Show dialog (only OK button), Example: zt dialog -s -m message content 
 -e Show edit dialog, Example: zt dialog -e -t title 
 ]
 
 
 zt x11status Query current x11 connection status (useful for internal channel)
 zt backgroundimage(bgi) Image path (set as current terminal background)
 backgroundimage(bgi)[
 Usage Help (full path required):
 zt backgroundimage /data/data/com.termux/files/home/.img/back.jpg 
 zt bgi /data/data/com.termux/files/home/.img/back.jpg 
 ]

Usage Help:
 -c Confirmation/cancel dialog (OK or Cancel), Example: zt dialog -c -t title -m message content 
 -s Show dialog (only OK button), Example: zt dialog -s -m message content 
 -e Show edit dialog, Example: zt dialog -e -t title
The input background image path is invalid
